title: RHEM  2  The  Cave
description:
Title: RHEM 2: The Cave
Genre: adventure / puzzle-solving / 1st-person
Released: 2nd November 2005
Developer: Knut Mueller
Publisher: RuneSoft
Description:
An intriguing first-person 3D adventure set in a hidden city of underground caves, RHEM 2 features non-linear gameplay and a captivating, immersive story. Your adventure begins when your rail car plunges below the earth's surface and into a mysterious subterranean world. Before returning to the land above, you must find an enigmatic artifact. In search of clues, you venture ever deeper, exploring a maze of clandestine caves, secret rooms, tunnels, water systems, and more, while solving clever puzzles, leading you to your ultimate destination!

How to play:
1) Run rhem2_setup.exe and install the game;
2) Start the game using its main executable or shortcuts (DRM free).

! Notice
You need to have QuickTime installed to view the in-game cinematics. I've included QuickTime alternative with the game, you can install it by running QuickTime_Alternative_322.exe.


If you like the game, BUY it!
